channel.title: Data Loss on Promotion of Research data management, an open source Project.

item.title: lost the backup
item.description: The external hard drive is VERY important to me as it contains 5 years of research data which are crucial for my PhD thesis !!! I think comments are unnecessary. Distributed under a CC-BY license, photo Â©Peter Murray-Rust originally posted at https://blogs.ch.cam.ac.uk/pmr/2011/08/01/why-you-need-a-data-management-plan/ Collected by Julien Colomb, data manager
